Class VerifierBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jepria.oauth.sdk.token.VerifierBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Verifier
    Direct Known Subclasses:

    public class VerifierBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements Verifier
    Basic verifier for JWT tokens. Checks AUD, ISS, EXP claims.
